pages.privacy-policy: Privacy policy - DecorDocks DecorDocks Home Service About Contact Privacy policy Information Collection: DecorDocks collects personal information such as name, email address, and contact details when customers make purchases or sign up for newsletters. Additionally, we may gather demographic data and browsing behavior to improve user experience and tailor our services. Use of Collected Information: The information collected by DecorDocks is used to process orders, personalize customer experiences, and communicate with users about promotions and updates. We may also analyze data to enhance our product offerings and optimize marketing strategies. Data Security Measures: DecorDocks employs industry-standard security measures to protect customer information from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure. This includes encryption protocols, secure server infrastructure, and regular system audits to identify and address potential vulnerabilities. Third-Party Disclosure: DecorDocks may share personal information with trusted third-party service providers to facilitate order fulfillment, payment processing, and marketing efforts. However, we do not sell or rent customer data to external parties for promotional purposes. Cookies and Tracking Technologies: Our website utilizes cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance user experience, gather usage statistics, and customize content based on individual preferences. Users have the option to manage cookie settings through their browser preferences. Opt-Out Options: Customers who wish to opt out of receiving marketing communications from DecorDocks can easily unsubscribe via the provided links in promotional emails or by contacting our customer support team. However, transactional emails related to order confirmations and account management may still be sent. Children's Online Privacy Protection: DecorDocks does not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of 13. Our services are intended for adults, and we encourage parents and guardians to supervise their children's online activities to ensure privacy and safety. Data Retention: DecorDocks retains customer information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy policy unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. Upon request, users can access, update, or delete their personal data stored by DecorDocks. DecorDocks@gmail.com. Compliance with Legal Obligations: We may disclose personal information when required to comply with legal obligations, enforce our site policies, or protect the rights, property, or safety of DecorDocks, its users, or others. This includes responding to lawful requests from government authorities or law enforcement agencies. International Data Transfers: DecorDocks operates globally and may transfer personal information to countries outside the user's jurisdiction for processing and storage. We take appropriate safeguards to ensure that such transfers comply with applicable data protection laws and maintain data security standards. Updates to Privacy Policy: DecorDocks reserves the right to update or revise this privacy policy periodically to reflect changes in our business practices, legal requirements, or technological advancements. Users will be notified of any significant updates and encouraged to review the revised policy. User Responsibilities: Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account credentials and ensuring the security of their personal information while using DecorDocks' website and services. Any unauthorized access or suspicious activity should be reported immediately. Consent to Data Processing: By using DecorDocks' website and services, users consent to the collection, processing, and storage of their personal information as described in this privacy policy. Consent may be withdrawn at any time by contacting our customer support team. DecorDocks@gmail.com. Contact Information: For inquiries regarding this privacy policy, data protection practices, or to exercise privacy rights, users can contact DecorDocks' privacy officer via the provided contact information on our website. We are committed to addressing concerns promptly and transparently. Customer Feedback: DecorDocks welcomes feedback and suggestions from customers regarding our privacy practices and service offerings. User input helps us continuously improve our policies and enhance user satisfaction. Data Breach Response: In the event of a data breach involving customer information, DecorDocks will promptly investigate the incident, notify affected users as required by law, and take necessary steps to mitigate risks and prevent future breaches. User Rights: Users have the right to access, rectify, or delete their personal information stored by DecorDocks, as well as the right to restrict or object to certain data processing activities. Requests for exercising these rights should be submitted in writing to our privacy officer. Business Transitions: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, user information may be transferred as part of the transaction. DecorDocks will notify users of any such change in ownership or control and provide options regarding their personal data. Governing Law: This privacy policy and any disputes arising from it are governed by the laws, without regard to its conflict of law principles. Users agree to submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located for resolving any legal proceedings related to this policy. Effective Date: This privacy policy is effective as and supersedes any prior versions. Users are encouraged to review the policy periodically for updates and changes. Continued use of DecorDocks' website and services constitutes acceptance of the current privacy practices. Home Service About Contact Privacy policy Terms and conditions Number: +91-511-7570341 DecorDocks@gmail.com Chhattisgarh 495001, India © 2024 DecorDocks. All rights reserved.

Step into tranquility with the Coastal Retreat Area Rug. $199.99 We believe we make all the difference The Genesis How It All Began At DecorDocks, we believe that your home should be a reflection of your unique style and personality. That's why we're dedicated to providing you with a curated selection of high-quality furniture and home decor that will elevate your living spaces to new heights of elegance and comfort. Our mission is simple: to help you create a home you love coming back to every day. Whether you're furnishing a cozy apartment, revamping a family home, or decorating a new space, we're here to inspire and guide you every step of the way. ‍With a focus on craftsmanship, design, and affordability, we handpick each item in our collection to ensure it meets our rigorous standards of quality and style. From timeless classics to modern marvels, we offer a diverse range of products to suit every taste and budget. But we're more than just a furniture store – we're your partners in home styling. Our team of experts is passionate about interior design and is always on hand to offer personalized advice and recommendations to help you bring your vision to life. ‍At DecorDocks, we believe that every home has a story to tell. Let us help you tell yours with our exquisite furniture and home decor. Welcome to DecorDocks – where style meets comfort, and inspiration meets reality. We Are Doing It Big Now Get ready to elevate your living space to new heights with DecorDocks. We're proud to announce that we're taking our offerings to the next level, bringing you an even grander selection of exquisite furniture and home decor. At DecorDocks, we believe that every home deserves to be a sanctuary of style and comfort. With our expanded collection, you'll discover an unparalleled range of high-quality pieces designed to suit every taste and elevate any room. pages.terms-conditions: Terms and conditions - DecorDocks DecorDocks Home Service About Contact Terms and conditions Acceptance of Terms: By accessing and using the DecorDocks website, you agree to comply with the terms and conditions outlined in this agreement. We reserve the right to accept or decline any order for any reason, including but not limited to product availability and pricing errors. Shipping and Delivery: DecorDocks endeavors to process and ship orders in a timely manner, subject to product availability and shipping restrictions. Delivery times may vary depending on the destination and shipping method selected at checkout. Returns and Exchanges: We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase from DecorDocks. We are committed to protecting your privacy and maintaining the security of your data. Indemnification: Users agree to indemnify and hold DecorDocks harmless from any claims, losses, damages, liabilities, or expenses arising out of their use of the website or violation of these terms and conditions. Limitation of Liability: In no event shall DecorDocks or its affiliates be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in any way connected with the use of our website or the products sold on it.
